title: FROM HAND TO MOUTH ( 1919) Harold Lloyd, Mildred David, Snub Pollard

sources.title: FROMHANDTOMOUTH1919HaroldLloydMildredDavidSnubPollard
sources.description: FROM HAND TO MOUTH (1919) - Starring: Harold Lloyd, Mildred David, Snub Pollard Directed by Alf Goulding Produced by Hal Roach Pathe Distributors This two reeler is noteworthy in antedating Buster Keaton's "Cops" (1922);Â  and which it obviously may well have influenced. William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com
